pages.text: $(li)The Frost Walker enchantment can be applied in any kind of Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment freezes water under you into frosted ice, allowing you to walk on the water.
pages.title: Frost Walker

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Frost Walker).
